text_logic_form: Find the perimeter of the shape.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $AB$ is $26$ units.
The length of the line $AD$ is $10$ units.
The length of the line $DC$ is $8$ units.
The length of the line $BC$ is $16$ units.
Point $C$ lies on the line connecting $B$ and $D$.
The lines $AD$ and $DC$ are perpendicular to each other.
line_instances: There are lines $AB$, $AC$, $BC$, forming a triangle $ACB$.
There are lines $AD$, $DC$, $BD$ forming a right triangle $ADC$.
